name: Its Not Gripping
description:
A game made for the godot wild jam 53, primarily focused on the assembly mechanic with a limited colour palette. The goal of the game is to get from the starting point to the light tower as creatively as possible. Collaboration between Dralimazing and Zman. Good luck and we hope you enjoy it!

Controls - Check Help for detailed instructions

During the build phase WASD move the camera, to move to the next phase press the space bar.

1,2,3,4 control the items needed to be placed

During the next phase where movement is required, 1,2,3,4 control the items individually (for example 1 will add force to the rocket, 2 will use the wheels, 3 will pop the balloons and 4 will trigger the piston) . The space bar also acts as a break during this phase.

If the objects arent attaching - refresh the level from the top left.
